channel.title: [QUEST] Fremminnik trials[QUEST]
channel.description:
I have recently created the second quest server... other than Danies questscape... I have only created 5 custom quests and 2 RuneScape quest's... I will be working on these quests... [center]
[ul][li]Desert Treasure[/li] [li]The Fremminik Trials[/li] [li]Recipe for disaster[/li] [li]Sheep herder[/li][/ul]
[/center]
I will create all these quests and hand them out... Recipe for disaster and Desert Tresure will take me approximately 2 months or... two and a half weeks..
Everything and all quests will be created in December 21st
--------------REMEMBER--------------- I will NOT release this... unless I have been paid for my own work... (sorry :( ) BUT... you can play on the server...

item.title: [QUEST] Fremminnik trials[QUEST]
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“xema, post:1, topic:154050”]I have recently created the second quest server… other than Danies questscape… I have only created 5 custom quests and 2 RuneScape quest’s… I will be working on these quests…
[center]

[ul][li]Desert Treasure[/li]
[li]The Fremminik Trials[/li]
[li]Recipe for disaster[/li]
[li]Sheep herder[/li][/ul]

[/center]

I will create all these quests and hand them out… Recipe for disaster and Desert Tresure will take me approximately 2 months or… two and a half weeks…

Everything and all quests will be created in December 21st

--------------REMEMBER---------------
I will NOT release this… unless I have been paid for my own work… (sorry ) BUT… you can play on the server…[/quote]

Urrr okay, kinda pointless letting us know. But why post all this if your not going to release, just after someone to buy your source?. . I would be willing to pay a good amount, but it has to be perfect. . Because i don’t have time to create lots of quests :S…

Things is, why would people buy servers?. .

Reasons: Can’t be bothered?

Can’t code?

Don’t know Java?..

Read full topic
